description: Be able to play the songs you like on your guitar! By combining video instructions, on-screen demonstrations, diagrams and notes along with complete printable documentation for each chapter, all the information and tools you need are available. A complete step by step strategy is provided for you to learn what to do, along with describing the practice routines you'll need to not only play barre chords, but also to transition from one to another. Bonus Lesson on Root Notes is included at no charge.
title: Guitar Lesson - Five Steps to Learn Barre Chords
